        public User checkCredentials(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String password)

        Parameters:
        email - Contains the email address entered by the user
        password - Contains the password entered by the user
        Returns:
        returns a User object with its appropriate details of the user.

        Returns:

      • returnBook

        public double returnBook(int user_id,
                         int bookId)
        Returns the book with the given user-id and book id
        Parameters:
        user_id - The id of the user returning the book
        bookId - The id of the book to be returned
        Returns:
        the fine if a book is returned more than 20 days late. It's 0 if it's returned before time.

      • posInWaitlist

        int posInWaitlist(int book_id,
                  int user_id)
        Returns the position the user(user_id) is in for the book(book_id). -1 if he/she's not in the wait-list
        Parameters:
        book_id - The id of the book
        user_id - The id of the user
        Returns:
        The position the user is in the wait-list for the book

      • calcFine

                java.sql.Date dueDate)
        Calculates the fine for a given bookid and user
        Parameters:
        user_id - The user who has to pay the fine
        bookId - The book which the user borrowed
        Returns:
        The fine which is calculated as noOfDaysExceeded * 20
